txt.en:
'Your victory has driven the Trév Duvárdain into the north, and my people have retaken Fail-á-Khro, [placeholder]. But we cannot yet rest.

'Return to Fail-á-Khro and speak with Cána if you wish to aid us further against the Trév Duvárdain.

'Fail-á-Khro is north of Aughaire, and many of my people hold it against the enemy.'
'Your legend is already growing, [placeholder]. May you grow it further by aiding us as we drive the Trév Duvárdain even further into Fasach-falroid!'
'Fail-á-Khro is to the north, [placeholder]. Speak with Cána there if you still wish to aid the Trév Gállorg, even after all you have already done for us.'
You have survived the Clúcath, and Fail-á-Khro has been retaken by the Trév Gállorg.
Cána is at Fail-á-Khro, north of Aughaire.\n\nThe Trév Gállorg have retaken Fail-á-Khro and now seek your assistance to hold it.
